articles.title: Epic Convention in London!!
articles.description: A little desctiption goes in here, cuz its just a desctiption.
articles.summary1: In this course, you will learn how to design technologies that bring people joy, rather than frustration. To do this, you'll learn techniques for rapidly prototyping and evaluating multiple interface alternatives — and why rapid prototyping and comparative evaluation are essential to excellent interaction design. You'll learn how to conduct fieldwork with people to help generate design ideas. You'll learn how to make paper prototypes and low-fidelity mock-ups that are interactive — and how to use these designs to get feedback from teammates, clients, and users. You'll learn principles of visual design, perception and cognition so that you can effectively organize and present information with your interfaces. And you'll learn how to perform and analyze controlled experiments online.
articles.summary2: In this course, you will learn how to design technologies that bring people joy, rather than frustration. And you'll learn how to perform and analyze controlled experiments online.

articles.title: Tattoos - a wedding gift?
articles.description: As getting a tattoo is becoming more and more common, we are seeing tattoos becoming parts of recording important events in our life, sometimes in unconventional times.
articles.summary1: Are tattoos fit for marriage? During her interview with us at ConceptInk< Missie pointed out that it is a natural part bonding.
